main event: A UFO sighting was reported by USAF personnel at Mather AFB, Sacramento, California, on June 29, 1953.
interesting points: The sighting occurred around 2145 PST,The object appeared initially as a bright red light,It was observed through field glasses by the control tower operators,The object reportedly disappeared when the observer turned away,There was no physical evidence of the sighting and it was classified as unidentified.
sighted object: a bright red light or unidentified aerial object
witness description: USAF personnel with one to four years of experience in control tower duties
